title: Is there any chance of a Third World War? How will it affect the world and its economy? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't think there's much chance of a world war. I do think, however, that we're embarked on a Time of Troubles that will be characterized by regional wars, civil wars, revolts, revolutions, economc instability etc. around the world. And the spillover from these troubles is going to cause major problems for Europe and America—as the former is discovering to its dismay even as I type. Making things worse is the melancholy fact that the so-called world community has no idea what to do about any of this nor, probably, the will to act.
"I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones."
